query:
SELECT m.maint_id,
       to_char(m.req_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') AS req_date,
       to_char(m.due_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') AS due_date,
       rf.description AS rf_desc,
       m.equip_id,
       m.maint_oper,
       s.description AS s_desc,
       to_char(m.start_date,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi') AS start_date,
       to_char(m.end_date,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi') AS end_date,
       re.routine_id,
       a.description AS a_desc,
       m.status_id,
       e.description AS e_desc,
       e.serial_num,
       e.model,
       e.asset_id,
       m.comments,
       u.name,
       m.supervisor
FROM maintenances m,
     status s,
     routine_freq rf,
     routines_on_equip re,
     equipments e,
     areas a,
     users u
WHERE m.status_id = s.status_id
  AND m.routine_id = re.routine_id
  AND m.freq_id = rf.freq_id
  AND m.equip_id = re.equip_id
  AND m.equip_id = e.equip_id
  AND e.area_id = a.area_id
  AND e.resp_eng = u.user_id
  AND (m.status_id = 'NASSG'
       OR m.status_id = 'PEND')
